content.description: A nice line in the alcove with some thoughtful movements and just cool with your back to the ocean.  BETA: start in the lowest portion of the alcove in the center back.  start with hands wrapped over a dull knife edge.  set feet and lean back to hit a good block behind you.  let feet swing to the left and dig a toe in.  match hands on the block/bulge.  throw up for a decent ledge and match again.  find the ok crimp to bump up to a decent hold and then either top out or traverse right.
content.location: center of the alcove at the very bottom

content.description: not much here although I didn't explore much beyond the one climb.  There is a beautiful alcove/cave that you come across.  It's like a mini amphitheater facing the ocean.
